content:
If you're a FHIR implementer whose picture was taken (as a FHIR Jedi, wielding a FHIR saber) - a PDF version of the calendar, and high-resolution photos can be found at the following URL: http://www.ringholm.com/persist/2016fhir_calendar.zip (128 Mb).

We'll be bringing printed versions to the upcoming connectathons, and (of course) to the FHIR DevDays 2016 (http://www.fhirdevdays.com/) to be held in November in Amsterdam.

The small print: don't use these images for commercial purposes.
